Crimes.Crime_Name: Making false statements to obtain immigration benefits

Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's failure to submit critical evidence
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Burden on applicant to provide sufficient evidence
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Officer not obligated to seek additional evidence
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Failure to consider evidence or procedural fairness breach
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant's failure to submit critical evidence regarding alleged risks in Romania
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No hearing required; no breach found
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Claims unsubstantiated due to lack of evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review alleging inadequate consideration of risk
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Canada – Federal Court review of immigration decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Obligation to submit evidence rests with applicant
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to include key documentary evidence

Crimes.Application_Error: Allegation that officer failed to consider evidence

Crimes.Application_Factor: No hearing required absent credibility issues

Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No duty to hold a hearing without credibility doubt

Crimes.Procedural_Issue: No duty to supplement incomplete applications
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to report or provide required updates/documents
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Criminal history and lack of valid status

Crimes.Procedural_Issue: No duty to hold hearing absent credibility concerns
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution due to criminal charge and health condition

Crimes.Claimant_Status: Failed refugee claimant with criminal record
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Risk of torture, ill-treatment upon return

Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient to meet burden of proof
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: No credible evidence of personalized risk
